name: ExtraClass
description: Simply Download ExtraClass app and Study anywhere, anytime. Full Videos Notes Test & MCQs are Completely updated for new session.  Subjects Covered at this Movement:  Class 12 - CBSE Full Syllabus Videos: 1. English- Vistas, Flamingo and Writing Section 2. Economics- Macro Economics & Indian Economy 3. Business Studies with Solved Case Studies 4. Accountancy Full Syllabus  Class 11 - CBSE Full Syllabus Videos: 1. English- Hornbill, Snapshot, Writing and Grammar Section 2. Economics- Micro Economics & Statistics 3. Business Studies Full Syllabus 4. Accountancy Full Syllabus  For Class 12 Science at this movement, we have Full Videos and Notes for English 1. English- Vistas, Flamingo and Writing Section  Class 11 - CBSE Full Syllabus Videos: 1. English- Hornbill, Snapshot, Writing and Grammar Section  Class 10 - English, History & Civics Soon we will be Launching other subjects also.   *Video classes by subject experts:  The conventional classroom method is old and we at ExtraClass know that every student is different and everybody learns differently, therefore our subject experts prepare video lectures so that the student can make the best use of his or her time and can prepare at their own pace. The videos are in simple language so that it becomes easy for students to understand the concept.  *Notes and Question Paper Analysis:  Now no need to worry about pausing video to note down the key points. Just click on the download notes tab and you are good to go. All our video lectures contains previous year question paper analysis and the hot topics that are expected to be in your examinations.   *Test series and sample papers:  Teachers at ExtraClass knows the importance of practice. Keeping this in mind our team of expert teachers have created various test series that are based on the test exam patterns. These tests give students the closest experience of board examination. Adding to this the students are also given opportunity to download all the CBSE sample papers.  our official website -  https://www.extraclass.in
